Package org.cesecore.audit.log

Class SecurityEventsLoggerSessionBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.audit.log.SecurityEventsLoggerSessionBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SecurityEventsLoggerSession, SecurityEventsLoggerSessionLocal, SecurityEventsLoggerSessionRemote
    public class SecurityEventsLoggerSessionBean
extends Object
implements SecurityEventsLoggerSessionLocal, SecurityEventsLoggerSessionRemote
    This class implements the SecurityEventsLogger interface. It handles the creation of a signed log for an event.
    Version:
    $Id: SecurityEventsLoggerSessionBean.java 29010 2018-05-23 13:09:53Z jekaterina_b_helmes $

      • log

                EventType eventType,
                EventStatus eventStatus,
                ModuleType module,
                ServiceType service)
         throws AuditRecordStorageException,
                AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: SecurityEventsLoggerSession
        Creates a signed log, stored in the database.
        Specified by:
        log in interface SecurityEventsLoggerSession
        Parameters:
        authToken - The authentication token of the entity that invoked the operation.
        eventType - The event log type.
        eventStatus - The status of the operation to log.
        module - The module where the operation took place.
        service - The service (application) that performed the operation.
        Throws:
        AuditRecordStorageException - On fail
        AuthorizationDeniedException - If access denied

      • log

        public void log​(AuthenticationToken authToken,
                EventType eventType,
                EventStatus eventStatus,
                ModuleType module,
                ServiceType service,
                String customId,
                String searchDetail1,
                String searchDetail2,
                Map<String,​Object> additionalDetails)
         throws AuditRecordStorageException,
                AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: SecurityEventsLoggerSession
        Creates a signed log, stored in the database.
        Specified by:
        log in interface SecurityEventsLoggerSession
        Parameters:
        authToken - The authentication token of the entity that invoked the operation.
        eventType - The event log type.
        eventStatus - The status of the operation to log.
        module - The module where the operation took place.
        service - The service (application) that performed the operation.
        customId - A custom identifier related to this event (e.g. a CA's identifier)
        searchDetail1 - A detail of this event that can be queried for using QueryCriteria (database) searches (e.g. a certificate serialnumber)
        searchDetail2 - A detail of this event that can be queried for using QueryCriteria (database) searches (e.g. a username)
        additionalDetails - Additional details of this event to be stored in a non-searchable manner.
        Throws:
        AuditRecordStorageException - On fail
        AuthorizationDeniedException - If access denied

      • log

                EventStatus eventStatus,
                ModuleType module,
                ServiceType service,

                String searchDetail2,
                String additionalDetailsMsg)
         throws AuditRecordStorageException
        Description copied from interface: SecurityEventsLoggerSessionLocal
        Gets trusted time, then calls log
        Specified by:
        log in interface SecurityEventsLoggerSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        eventType - The event log type.
        eventStatus - The status of the operation to log.
        module - The module where the operation took place.
        service - The service(application) that performed the operation.
        authToken - The authentication token that invoked the operation.
        customId - A custom identifier related to this event (e.g. a CA's identifier)
        searchDetail1 - A detail of this event that can be queried for using QueryCriteria (database) searches (e.g. a certificate serialnumber)
        searchDetail2 - A detail of this event that can be queried for using QueryCriteria (database) searches (e.g. a username)
        additionalDetailsMsg - A single additional details String to be logged.
        Throws:
        AuditRecordStorageException - On fail
